sentences.english: Make a bronze basin, with its bronze stand, for washing.
sentences.chinese: 你要用铜做洗濯盆和盆座，以便洗濯。

sentences.english: Make a bronze basin, with its bronze stand, for washing.
sentences.chinese: 你要用铜做洗濯盆和盆座，以便洗濯。

sentences.english: I baptized my earlobes with rosewater.
sentences.chinese: 再用玫瑰香水洗濯耳垂。

sentences.english: This afternoon my classmates and I went to help the drivers clean the buses.
sentences.chinese: 今天下战书我和同砚们去资助司机叔叔洗濯车辆。

sentences.english: Rinse out the soap from the washing.
sentences.chinese: 把洗濯物上的肥皂漂洗干净。

sentences.english: Believe root being alive, washed by spring, just like roads of two persons.
sentences.chinese: 相信根活着，被泉水洗濯，就像两个人的道路。

sentences.english: Make a bronze basin, with its bronze stand, for washing.
sentences.chinese: 你要用铜做洗濯盆和盆座，以便洗濯。

sentences.english: Make a bronze basin, with its bronze stand, for washing.
sentences.chinese: 你要用铜做洗濯盆和盆座，以便洗濯。

sentences.english: La, la, I wash them, and then I dry them.
sentences.chinese: 啦啦，洗濯之后就把它们晒干。

sentences.english: Wash with cold water and dry in the air.
sentences.chinese: 冷水洗濯，晾干即可，勿用热水。

sentences.english: A vehicle wash set up at the entrance of construction sites to eliminate dust.
sentences.chinese: 建筑工地入口处设立洗濯池，洗去车辆灰尘。

definition: to rinse/to wash/to clean/to purge/to comb out
to clean (with water or alcohol)/to wipe and wash/to swab/to scrub
to moisten/to dampen/to be steeped in/to be imbued with
